main event: An unidentified luminous object was reported in the sky over Albuquerque, New Mexico on September 24, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 minutes and appeared and disappeared gradually., Reliable witnesses reported clear conditions during the sighting., There were multiple sightings of unidentified objects in the vicinity around the same time., No weather phenomena were found to account for the sighting., The object could not be determined in terms of size, shape, or color.
witness description: civilian, reliable witness, clear night sky
